verbs.description: The two companies [V: are] betting that Trump administration regulators will be friendly to their ambitions .
[ARG0: The two companies] are [V: betting] [ARG2: that Trump administration regulators will be friendly to their ambitions] .
The two companies are betting that Trump administration regulators [V: will] be friendly to their ambitions .
The two companies are betting that [ARG1: Trump administration regulators] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: friendly to their ambitions] .
